roadmap.title: Roadmap
roadmap.body: It seems like you've requested something that is already on the roadmap. Please keep in mind we do this in our free time for free, so please be patient.
roadmap.description: Tells users that something is already on the roadmap.

duplicate.title: Duplicate
duplicate.body: This seems to be a duplicate of [#{arg0}](https://github.com/NateXS/Scratch-Everywhere/issues/{arg0}) on GitHub
duplicate.description: Tells users that there's already a thread on GitHub.

pr.title: Pull Request
pr.body: There seems to be a pull request that adds this: [#{arg0}](https://github.com/NateXS/Scratch-Everywhere/pull/{arg0})
pr.description: Tells users that there's a pull request that adds a feature they're asking for.

controls.title: Controls
controls.description: Shows an image of the controls.
